name: Comet Crasher
description: Soar, shoot and dodge - but don't stop moving. Fall down at breakneck speeds in this fast-paced platformer filled with chaos and explosions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Dual-core 2.4GHz or higher (i5 or i7 series Intel processor or AMD equivalent). SSE2 support required. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video memory or more, DirectX 10 or higher, Shader Model 4 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection required to participate in online leaderboard
